title: Long-lines for research monitoring and efficient population regulation of an invasive apex predator, European catfish (Silurus glanis)
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Lukáš Vejřík, Ivana Vejříková, Petr Blabolil, Daniel Bartoň, Zuzana Sajdlová, Luboš Kočvara, Jiří Peterka, Milan Muška, Jindřich Duras, Tomáš Jůza, Filipe Ribeiro, Rui Rivaes, Diogo Ribeiro, Beatriz Castro, Mafalda Moncada, Martin Čech
